Hey Mattias, I know you also wrote your own GP evolution system.  
What are you thoughts on "NEATizing" GP?  Do you think it would work 
out well?

ken

--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "Mattias Fagerlund" <mattias@c...> 
wrote:
> Looking at my Symbolic Regression code, I realize that it's been 
using 
> some of these operators for a very long time - it's equiped with 
> Sigmoid, Gaussian, ADD and Multiply to solve the problems.
> 
> I'd have to run maaany long runs to determine if it helps or not, 
and 
> I'm not in a possition to do that right now.
> 
> DelphiNEAT is a pretty straight forward implementation of NEAT, 
and 
> these operators / transfer functions are simple an alternative way 
of 
> using the input to determine the output. 
> 
> cheers,
> mattias
